description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Fight with monsters, cast powerful spells, loot magic items and save the innocent. Do it all playing as your Xbox LIVE Avatar! There's also special difficulty for hardcore gamers. All that for only 80 MSP!
description.short: Fight with monsters, cast powerful spells, loot magic items and save the innocent. Do it all playing as your Xbox LIVE Avatar! There's also special difficulty for hardcore gamers. All that for only 80 MSP!
